project.name: Sample Application Tests
project.description: Test plan for the Sample Application v1.0

tests.name: Valid Login
tests.description: Verify that users can log in with valid credentials
tests.command: Navigate to /login, enter valid username and password, click Submit
tests.expectedResult: User is redirected to dashboard, welcome message displays username
tests.prepSteps: Ensure test user account exists: testuser@example.com / TestPass123!

tests.name: Invalid Login - Wrong Password
tests.description: Verify that login fails with incorrect password
tests.command: Navigate to /login, enter valid username with wrong password, click Submit

tests.name: Password Reset Flow
tests.description: Verify password reset email is sent
tests.expectedResult: Confirmation message and reset email received within 1 minute
tests.prepSteps: Have access to test email inbox

tests.name: Dashboard Loads Correctly
tests.description: Verify dashboard displays all widgets after login
tests.command: Log in and observe dashboard page
tests.expectedResult: All 4 widgets (Stats, Recent Activity, Quick Actions, Notifications) are visible

tests.name: Widget Data Refresh
tests.description: Verify widgets refresh when clicking refresh button
tests.command: Click the refresh icon on any widget
tests.expectedResult: Widget shows loading indicator, then updates with fresh data
tests.prepSteps: Make a change in another browser tab to create new data

tests.name: Export to CSV
tests.description: Verify data exports correctly to CSV format
tests.command: Navigate to Reports, select date range, click 'Export CSV'
tests.expectedResult: CSV file downloads with correct headers and data
tests.prepSteps: Ensure there is data in the selected date range

tests.name: Export to PDF
tests.description: Verify report exports to PDF with formatting
tests.command: Navigate to Reports, select date range, click 'Export PDF'
tests.expectedResult: PDF downloads with charts, tables, and company branding
